title: Synthesis molecular docking and DFT studies on novel indazole derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13218-13226
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02151G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bandaru Gopi, Vijayaparthasarathi Vijayakumar
3-Carboxamide indazoles have been developed using the amide coupling process. Density function theory (DFT) computations, and the assessment of binding energy using Auto Dock, illustrate the pharmaceutical effectiveness.
